item.description:
***Please note! This event has been moved to Saturday, May 11th at Kiersten's house in South Portland. Address & directions will be emailed out on Monday, May 6th once everyone has had a chance to check their schedules and update their RSVPs based on the change***

 

Wine, Cheese, and Appetizers

1. Date: Saturday, May 11th at 5pm

2. Location: Kiersten's House in South Portland

Address & directions will be emailed out one week in advance.

3. Host: Kiersten

4. Theme: Wine, Cheese, and Appetizers

Please sign up to bring an item listed below and please specify what you will be bringing (including TYPE of wine or cheese). We will need someone to bring small paper cups (for wine tasting), plates, napkins, and plastic silverware too please. That person will be exempt from bringing any other items. To sign up for an item, please post a comment at the bottom of this page. Also, please be specific about what you will be bringing so we don't have duplicates. Thank you!

1. White wine (1 bottle) - Carol B - Pinot grigio

2. White wine (1 bottle) - Becca 2 - Sauvignon blanc

3. White wine (1 bottle) - Megan C - Riesling

4. White wine (1 bottle) - Em - Vermontino

5. White wine (1 bottle) - KellyAnn - Chardonnay

6. Red wine (1 bottle) -

7. Red wine (1 bottle) -

8. Red wine (1 bottle) - Lisa - Shiraz & Cheddar Cheese

9. Red wine (1 bottle) - Ellen - Cabernet Sauvignon & Gorgonzola cheese

10. Red wine (1 bottle) - Dominica - Merlot

11. Red wine (1 bottle) - Eiren - Syrah

12. Cheese - Laura R - Muenster cheese

13. Cheese - Ellen - Gorgonzola  & crackers

14. Cheese -

15. Cheese -

16. Cheese - Patty - Swiss cheese

17. Cheese - Kathleen - Mozzarrella cheese & olives

18. Cheese - Celeste - Local goat cheese

19. Appetizer - Beth - TBD

20. Appetizer - Maravillosa - TBD

21. Appetizer - Kiersten - TBD

22. Appetizer - Stacy - Iced tea & Hummus

23. Appetizer - Susan - TBD

24. Appetizer -

25. Appetizer -Andrea - TBD

26. Non-alcoholic drinks (water, soda, etc) - Priscilla

27. Small cups (for wine tasting), plates, napkins, etc. - Linda E
item.how_to_find_us: Kiersten will be answering the door
item.name: Girls Night! Theme: Wine, Cheese, and Appetizers
